titles.title: A bill to establish the National Defense Accelerator Network pilot program.
National Defense Accelerator Network Act of 2018
National Defense Accelerator Network Act of 2018
National Defense Accelerator Network Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
National Defense Accelerator Network Act of 2018
This bill directs the Department of Defense to carry out a pilot program establishing an innovation network to support the creation of startups that produce technologies with both military and civilian uses.
